THIS IS A 2 PLAYER GAME, please find another controller and play with a friend!

Welcome to In The Dark,

A CO-OP Puzzle Adventure game, where you venture with a little boy and girl trying to save their colonies' lives! the world has been frozen over, and these kids had never seen the outside world, so in this short 5-minute game, you venture through many dark caves and mines, slowly making your way back to the surface, where your ancestors had come from, discovering forgotten spirits along the way.

CONTROLS:
  • Press "SPACE", "square"(PS), "A"(XBox) to JOIN
  • WASD / left joystick to move
  • "SPACE", "Cross"(PS), "B"(XBox) to JUMP
  • "F", "Triangle"(PS), "B"(XBox) to PIGGYBACK
  • "ALT " + F4 to exit
